name: PETSCII Fireplace
description:
Happy holidays! A simple, chill ambient screen savery-type thing made with Playscii. Soundtrack is "The Stars Come Out" from Brother Android's album October November December.

See the Playscii page for hardware requirements; if you have a GPU newer than 2009 or so you should be fine.

The Linux build runs from source, see Playscii's documentation for info on what dependencies you'll need installed.

macOS build coming first or second week of January 2018.
